chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned being referred to a chatbot named Tobi.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about being referred to a chatbot instead of speaking to a human representative.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's ability to handle customer inquiries or provide an option for customers to speak to a human representative.

complaint.description: The customer purchased 1GB of data that did not work and experienced difficulties with customer service. They also mentioned unauthorized deductions from their airtime.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue with the data not working, provide better customer service assistance, and refund any unauthorized deductions.

meta.review_content: i bought data for 1gb yesterday night and it did not work, i called the customer service numerous times instead i was refered to a robot tobi, i called again this morning a lady that was assisting me reimbursed my airtime the they deducted R3 i dont know for what. this is the worse network provider i have ever used. the network is a nightmare and on top of that they do as they please with your data
